mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOSPITAL ( HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, TYPE, SIDOCDNM, SGGUCDNM, ADDRESS, PHONE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, HOSPITAL_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{hospitalId}, #{hospitalName}, #{type}, #{sidoCdNm}, #{sgguCdNm}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{hospitalUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, TYPE, SIDOCDNM, SGGUCDNM, ADDRESS, PHONE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, HOSPITAL_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM HOSPITAL LIMIT 20;
SELECT HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, TYPE, SIDOCDNM, SGGUCDNM, ADDRESS, PHONE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, HOSPITAL_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOSPITAL_NAME = #{name}
SELECT HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, TYPE, SIDOCDNM, SGGUCDNM, ADDRESS, PHONE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, HOSPITAL_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM HOSPITAL WHERE SIDOCDNM = #{sidoCdNm}
SELECT HOSPITAL_ID, HOSPITAL_NAME, TYPE, SIDOCDNM, SGGUCDNM, ADDRESS, PHONE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, HOSPITAL_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM HOSPITAL WHERE TYPE = #{type}
